TopicTitle: #d Mesh Exportation and Use in KSP

Articles.Content:
Probably the wrong section if so i'm sorry feel free to move this Post

i have lightwave, daz, maya, 3dsm and 3dmax so making messes in no issue

i need info on exporting and using in ksp
there's plent of tutorials, you'll need unity and part tools 0.20

links to unity and part tools 0.20????

opps found both... Buying unity pro now since i have the $
